citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30pm on 16-
FEB-23.
Inspector called licensee and was able to make contact with them, but they were unavailable to come do an inspection.
Additional Inspectors:
WILLIAM HEINE, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30pm on 16-
FEB-23. 
 
Inspector called licensee and was able to make contact with them, but they were unavailable to come do an inspection. 
 
 
 
Additional Inspectors:
